title: Linee Series
description: Le Linee Series takes inspiration from the unique facade of a palazzo hidden on the island of Giudecca. Once an industrial area, the neighborhood was transformed in the 1980s, and the building’s singular new facade has since become a distinctive landmark of contemporary Venetian architecture.
